meanings.definition: A rounded knob on the top of a handle or other object.
meanings.sent1: The knop on the lid of the jar was easy to grip.
meanings.sent2: She pressed the knop to open the drawer.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to balance on the knop of the fence.
meanings.sent4: The moon looked like a silver knop in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The knop felt smooth and cool to the touch.

meanings.definition: A small ornamental knob or button.
meanings.sent1: The knop on her dress sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: He sewed a knop onto the cushion for decoration.
meanings.sent3: The knop on the hat looked like a tiny crown.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a bright knop in the dull room.
meanings.sent5: The knop added a touch of elegance to the curtain.
